title: Galaxy Coaster
short: Glossy resin coaster with galaxy swirl.
description: Hand-poured epoxy resin coaster with deep galaxy swirl. Diameter 9cm. Food-safe top coat.

title: Ocean Board
short: Mini decorative board with epoxy ocean.
description: Decorative epoxy ocean board on birch base. Perfect for room decor.

title: Mini Keychain
description: Small resin keychain with glitter and colorful pigments. Custom text available.
